name: Help My Robot Shooter Broke Their Arm During The Robot Olympics And Now It Can't Aim Properly
name_original: Help My Robot Shooter Broke Their Arm During The Robot Olympics And Now It Can't Aim Properly
description:
My submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. It's also my first game jam where I actually submitted something!

Try to shoot the targets while your weapon is constantly spinning around you. See how long you can survive before hitting an obstacle or your own bullets!
